verses.verse: And it shall be, when thou art come in<WH935> unto the land<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee for an inheritance<WH5159>, and possessest<WH3423> it, and dwellest<WH3427> therein;

That thou shalt take<WH3947> of the first<WH7225> of all the fruit<WH6529> of the earth<WH127>, which thou shalt bring<WH935> of thy land<WH776> that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, and shalt put<WH7760> it in a basket<WH2935>, and shalt go<WH1980> unto the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there.

And thou shalt go<WH935> unto the priest<WH3548> that shall be in those days<WH3117>, and say<WH559> unto him, I profess<WH5046> this day<WH3117> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, that I am come<WH935> unto the country<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> sware<WH7650> unto our fathers<WH1> for to give<WH5414> us.
And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the basket<WH2935> out of thine hand<WH3027>, and set it down<WH3240> before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>.

And thou shalt speak<WH6030> and say<WH559> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, A Syrian<WH761> ready to perish<WH6> was my father<WH1>, and he went down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714>, and sojourned<WH1481> there with<WH4962> a few<WH4592>, and became there a nation<WH1471>, great<WH1419>, mighty<WH6099>, and populous<WH7227>:
And the Egyptians<WH4713> evil entreated<WH7489> us, and afflicted<WH6031> us, and laid<WH5414> upon us hard<WH7186> bondage<WH5656>:

And when we cried<WH6817> unto the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of our fathers<WH1>, the LORD<WH3068> heard<WH8085> our voice<WH6963>, and looked<WH7200> on our affliction<WH6040>, and our labour<WH5999>, and our oppression<WH3906>:

And the LORD<WH3068> brought us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, and with great<WH1419> terribleness<WH4172>, and with signs<WH226>, and with wonders<WH4159>:
And he hath brought<WH935> us into this place<WH4725>, and hath given<WH5414> us this land<WH776>, even a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

And now, behold, I have brought<WH935> the firstfruits<WH6529> <WH7225> of the land<WH127>, which thou, O LORD<WH3068>, hast given<WH5414> me. And thou shalt set<WH3240> it before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>:

And thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> in every good<WH2896> thing which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> unto thee, and unto thine house<WH1004>, thou, and the Levite<WH3881>, and the stranger<WH1616> that is among<WH7130> you.

When thou hast made an end<WH3615> of tithing<WH6237> all the tithes<WH4643> of thine increase<WH8393> the third<WH7992> year<WH8141>, which is the year<WH8141> of tithing<WH4643>, and hast given<WH5414> it unto the Levite<WH3881>, the stranger<WH1616>, the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, that they may eat<WH398> within thy gates<WH8179>, and be filled<WH7646>;

Then thou shalt say<WH559> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, I have brought away<WH1197> the hallowed things<WH6944> out of mine house<WH1004>, and also have given<WH5414> them unto the Levite<WH3881>, and unto the stranger<WH1616>, to the fatherless<WH3490>, and to the widow<WH490>, according to all thy commandments<WH4687> which thou hast commanded<WH6680> me: I have not transgressed<WH5674> thy commandments<WH4687>, neither have I forgotten<WH7911> them:

I have not eaten<WH398> thereof in my mourning<WH205>, neither have I taken away<WH1197> ought thereof for any unclean<WH2931> use, nor given<WH5414> ought thereof for the dead<WH4191>: but I have hearkened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430>, and have done<WH6213> according to all that thou hast commanded<WH6680> me.

Look down<WH8259> from thy holy<WH6944> habitation<WH4583>, from heaven<WH8064>, and bless<WH1288> thy people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, and the land<WH127> which thou hast given<WH5414> us, as thou swarest<WH7650> unto our fathers<WH1>, a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

This day<WH3117> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> thee to do<WH6213> these statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941>: thou shalt therefore keep<WH8104> and do<WH6213> them with all thine heart<WH3824>, and with all thy soul<WH5315>.

Thou hast avouched<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> this day<WH3117> to be thy God<WH430>, and to walk<WH3212> in his ways<WH1870>, and to keep<WH8104> his statutes<WH2706>, and his commandments<WH4687>, and his judgments<WH4941>, and to hearken<WH8085> unto his voice<WH6963>:

And the LORD<WH3068> hath avouched<WH559> thee this day<WH3117> to be his peculiar<WH5459> people<WH5971>, as he hath promised<WH1696> thee, and that thou shouldest keep<WH8104> all his commandments<WH4687>;

And to make<WH5414> thee high<WH5945> above all nations<WH1471> which he hath made<WH6213>, in praise<WH8416>, and in name<WH8034>, and in honour<WH8597>; and that thou mayest be an holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, as he hath spoken<WH1696>.
